com.hyperwallet.android.util

Class JsonUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hyperwallet.android.util.JsonUtils

  • public final class JsonUtils
extends Object
    Internal SDK use only. This class represents Parsing JSON string object to equivalent model and converting JSONObject into a Mapped key-value pair data and vice-versa

      JsonUtils()

      • fromJsonString

        public static <T> T fromJsonString(String data,
                                   TypeReference<T> typeReference)
                            throws org.json.JSONException,
                                   InvocationTargetException,
                                   NoSuchMethodException,
                                   InstantiationException,
                                   IllegalAccessException
        TypeReference deserialization implementation that derives the T of TypeReference based from passed JSON string data  

        Moreover this approach preserves the intended Type in the nth Generic form; for example List<T> where T is Class<T>

          For this formal generator to work all types should follow constructor signature contract of the following:
        • Type Constructor(JSONObject)
        • Type Constructor(JSONObject, Class)
        Parameters:
        data - JSON serialized data
        typeReference - Type of class specified by T that, we want to derive based from JSON response context
        Returns:
        the T representation equivalent from JSON data
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        InvocationTargetException
        NoSuchMethodException
        InstantiationException
        IllegalAccessException
